activities:
Personal Information Collected: If you request information through our on-line contact forms at www.cmcg-us.com we ask for and store the business-related information you provide (such as name, e-mail, address, corporate profile) in order to satisfy the underlying request or purpose of your accessing www.cmcg-us.com Typically, you will not receive any unsolicited e-mail from Clarke Management Consulting Group as a result of supplying this information. Personal information you voluntarily supply is not shared for use outside Clarke Management Consulting Group.   We do not rent, sell or trade any personally identifiable information about you to third parties.
If you apply for a job at Clarke Management Consulting Group, we request information about you.  This information is used for employment consideration only.  Unless you request otherwise, we may keep the information for future consideration.
contactoff1: 1155 F Street NW, 10th Floor, Washington DC 20004
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: phone, fax and pager numbers, address, and email address
recoursemech: CMCG agrees to cooperate and comply with EU and Switzerland data protection authorities in the investigation and resolution of complaints brought under the Safe Harbor framework. CMCG has chosen to use the EU Data Protection Authorities and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner to serve as independent recourse mechanisms for dispute resolution.
